baseUrl.description: The base URL of the Jira instance.

versionNumbers.description: The major, minor, and revision version numbers of the Jira version.

deploymentType.description: The type of server deployment. This is always returned as *Cloud*.

buildNumber.description: The build number of the Jira version.

buildDate.description: The timestamp when the Jira version was built.

serverTime.description: The time in Jira when this request was responded to.

scmInfo.description: The unique identifier of the Jira version.

serverTitle.description: The name of the Jira instance.

healthChecks.description: Jira instance health check results. Deprecated and no longer returned.

name.description: The name of the Jira health check item.

description.description: The description of the Jira health check item.

passed.description: Whether the Jira health check item passed or failed.
